# Request for Supply Arrangement for South Coast Salmon Monitoring and Biological Support

## Solicitation Details:

* **Reference Number**: cb-8334-33513598
* **Solicitation Number**: 30004087A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-08-21
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2028-06-30T13:00:00

## Overview:

Pêches et Océans Canada (MPO) invites qualified suppliers to participate in this Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) for the provision of South Coast Salmon Monitoring and Biological Support services. The successful suppliers will be awarded a Supply Arrangement (SA) with the MPO to provide these services on an "as and when requested" basis.

## Scope of Work:

The services to be provided under this RFSA include:

* South Coast Salmon Population Monitoring and Biological Support
* South Coast Salmon Fishery Monitoring and Biological Support
* South Coast Salmon Habitat Monitoring and Biological Support
* South Coast Salmon Population, Fishery and Habitat Analysis

These services will be provided in three zones:

* Zone 1: Cape Lazo to Jordon River South (Sunshine Coast)
* Zone 2: Tatchu Point to Cape Lazo (Mainland Inlets)
* Zone 3: Tatchu Point to Jordon River North

## Eligibility:

To be eligible, suppliers must be able to provide the required services in the specified zones. Preference will be given to Indigenous suppliers eligible under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business.

## Tender Evaluation:

Tenders will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Experience and qualifications
* Technical capabilities
* Price

## Awarding:

The MPO reserves the right to negotiate the price downward based on the actual requirement or scope of work.

## Notice Posting:

A notice will be posted for the duration of the arrangement on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow new suppliers to become qualified.

## Contracting Authority:

For inquiries regarding this RFSA, please contact Pascal Busungu, Contracting Authority, at DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca or (506)-429-6269.

## Important Documents:

The solicitation documents, including the RFSA and the terms and conditions, are available on the Canada Buys website. Suppliers are responsible for ensuring they have the most up-to-date documentation prior to submitting their bid. LES SOUMISSIONNAIRES SONT AVISÉS QUE
